tasks.label: Source workspace (opens new terminal)
tasks.command: bash -lc 'export TURTLEBOT3_MODEL=burger; source /opt/ros/<distro>/setup.bash; if [ -f "${workspaceFolder}/devel/setup.bash" ]; then source "${workspaceFolder}/devel/setup.bash"; elif [ -f "${workspaceFolder}/install/setup.bash" ]; then source "${workspaceFolder}/install/setup.bash"; fi; exec bash'

tasks.label: ROS2: Launch <pkg> <launch>
tasks.command: bash -lc 'export TURTLEBOT3_MODEL=burger; source /opt/ros/<distro>/setup.bash; source "${workspaceFolder}/install/setup.bash"; ros2 launch <pkg> <launch>.py'
